Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Kendrick Perkins?

Kendrick Perkins is 40 years old.

Where was Kendrick Perkins born?

Kendrick Perkins was born in Nederland, Texas.

When was Kendrick Perkins born?

Kendrick Perkins was born on November 10, 1984.

How tall is Kendrick Perkins?

Kendrick Perkins is 6-10 (208 cm) tall.

How much did Kendrick Perkins weigh when playing?

Kendrick Perkins weighed 270 lbs (122 kg) when playing.

Is Kendrick Perkins in the Hall of Fame?

Kendrick Perkins is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Kendrick Perkins drafted?

Kendrick Perkins was drafted by Memphis Grizzlies, 1st round (27th pick, 27th overall), 2003 NBA Draft.

What position did Kendrick Perkins play?

Center.

When did Kendrick Perkins retire?

Kendrick Perkins last played in 2018.

What is Kendrick Perkins' net worth?

Kendrick Perkins made at least $57,268,448 playing professional basketball.

How much did Kendrick Perkins make?

Kendrick Perkins made $9,654,342 in 2015.

What did Kendrick Perkins average?

Kendrick Perkins averaged 5.4 points, 5.8 rebounds, and 1.0 assists per game.

How many rings does Kendrick Perkins have?

Kendrick Perkins won one championship.

What is Kendrick Perkins' Twitter account?

Kendrick Perkins is on Twitter at KendrickPerkins.

What schools did Kendrick Perkins attend?

Kendrick Perkins attended Clifton J. Ozen in Beaumont, Texas.
